body_html:
Thanks for the PR, but this change should not be needed. The notebooks in the master branch are meant to be compatible with the code on theaster branch, and tf.Variable works just fine there.

The notebooks in the release branches are in sync with the release libraries.

body:
Thanks for the PR, but this change should not be needed. The notebooks in the master branch are meant to be compatible with the code on theaster branch, and `tf.Variable` works just fine there. 

The notebooks in the release branches are in sync with the release libraries.
